Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source

Class DeltaSource

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.AbstractSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.DatasetSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.FileSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.DeltaSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSource, QueryableDataSource
public class DeltaSource extends FileSource
A class for making FHIR data in Delta tables on the filesystem available for query. It is assumed that the schema of the Delta tables aligns with that of the Pathling FHIR encoders. Delta tables store data in Parquet format internally, so this source uses the parquet extension for file detection.
Author:
John Grimes, Piotr Szul

    • DeltaSource

      public DeltaSource(@Nonnull PathlingContext context, @Nonnull String path)
      Constructs a DeltaSource with the specified PathlingContext and path.
      Parameters:
      context - the PathlingContext to use
      path - the path to the Delta table directory

    • DeltaSource

      public DeltaSource(@Nonnull PathlingContext context, @Nonnull Map<String,Collection<String>> files)
      Constructs a DeltaSource with the specified PathlingContext and map of resource types to Delta table paths.
      Parameters:
      context - the PathlingContext to use
      files - a map where keys are resource type names and values are collections of Delta table paths
